sudo apt install libglew-dev
sudo apt install libfreetype6-dev
sudo apt install libglfw3-dev
sudo apt install libboost-dev
sudo apt install libboost-locale-dev
sudo apt install libfmt-dev
sudo apt install libspdlog-dev
sudo apt install libopencv-dev
sudo apt install libwebp-dev
sudo apt install liblz4-dev
sudo apt install libopenal-dev
sudo apt install libgtk2.0-dev
sudo apt install libminizip-dev
sudo apt install libuchardet-dev
sudo apt install libarchive-dev
sudo apt install libogg-dev
sudo apt install libopus-dev
sudo apt install libopusfile-dev
sudo apt install libvorbis-dev







sudo apt install libglew-dev libfreetype6-dev libglfw3-dev libboost-dev libboost-locale-dev libfmt-dev libspdlog-dev libopencv-dev libwebp-dev liblz4-dev libopenal-dev libgtk2.0-dev libminizip-dev libuchardet-dev libarchive-dev libogg-dev libopus-dev libopusfile-dev libvorbis-dev


sudo apt install cmake
